attributes.action: Better health care for woman with endometriosis within fife
attributes.additional_details: As support group leader for Endometriosis UK in fife I hear so many stories everyday of treatment. Even as far as not having leaflets handed to them about endometriosis. There is no cure for disease and things need to change.
attributes.background: How many stories do I need to hear from woman in fife Scotland about the treatment they received in fife. To many woman are not getting the right treatment or information they deserve. It’s time this changes we need better treatment and understanding from our doctors

rejection.details:
Health care in Scotland is the responsibility of the Scottish Govenrment and Parliament. 

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
